name: SDGA
description: SDGA Token bridges finance and sustainability to accelerate progress on the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDG). Built on secure blockchain infrastructure and paired with advanced measurement technology such as SDG Assessment SPF+ UN Sustainable Development Performance Indicator (SDPI) scorecard. SDGA funds and verifies high-impact carbon credits, plastic credits, bio-diversity credits climate and social projects. Token holders gain staking rewards, voting rights in decentralized governance, and real-time impact reporting â€” creating a transparent, investable pathway to measurable regenerative outcomes.
